# init(indexSet:)

**Initializer**

Initializes an allocated [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NSIndexSet] object with an index set.

## Declaration

```swift
init(indexSet: IndexSet)
```

## Parameters

- **indexSet**: An index set.

## Return Value

Initialized [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NSIndexSet] object with `indexSet`.

## Discussion

This method is a designated initializer for [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NSIndexSet].

## Creating Index Sets

- **init(index:)**: Initializes an allocated [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NSIndexSet] object with an index.
- **init(indexesIn:)**: Initializes an allocated [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NSIndexSet] object with an index range.
